original_text:
Merlin’s Moneyburst
La magia ha sempre interessato tutti (non per niente uno dei più grandi fenomeni letterati degli ultimi anni è Harry Potter) e quali figura rappresenta meglio l’arcana attrazione per le arti magiche se non Merlino? Negli anni gli sono state dedicate varie slot, tra cui Merlin’s Money Burst della Nextgen di cui andremo a parlare oggi.
Riuscirà il comparto grafico e tecnico di questa slot a stregarci? Scopriamolo insieme.
Merlin’s Money Burst – Il viola la fa da padrone
Cominciamo a parlare dell’aspetto grafico, in quanto anche l’occhio vuole la sua parte. La slot si apre con un modello 3D di Merlino che sparisce mostrandoci la griglia di gioco composta dai classici simboli delle carte da gioco (A, K, Q…) tutti corredati da degli occhi che guardano verso il puntatore mouse.
Una scelta vagamente inquietante ma che dimostra una cura nei dettagli da non sottovalutare. Altri simboli che vediamo sono l’occhio nell’ampolla, il grimorio magico e il rubino artigliato.
Dal punto di vista sonoro, invece, abbiamo una musica tenue, quasi un coro a farci compagnia, interrotto di tanto in tanto dal suono di una goccia d’acqua o dal verso di un gufo: il tutto per sottolineare ancor di più l’illusione di trovarci in mezzo a una foresta, pronti ad assistere a uno degli incantesimi del grande Mago Merlino.
Merlin’s Money Burst – Meccaniche di gioco
Arriviamo finalmente a parlare del comportato tecnico e dei meccanismi di gioco di questa slot: la griglia che ci appare davanti è sicuramente fuori dal comune: infatti da una parte troviamo uno schema 3*3 che mostra 9 simboli a ogni giocata, con una piccola griglia accessoria a sinistra che mostra altri 4 simboli a ogni giocata.
Le linee di vincita sono 60, le quali insieme all’RTP pari al 96.75% vanno a equilibrare una volatilità della slot piuttosto alta: possiamo quindi aspettarci un buon numero di giri privi di vincite prima di ottenerne una di valore interessante ma meno rispetto ad altri titoli con alta volatilità.
Tra i vari simboli che si trovano nella griglia, si deve prestare particolare attenzione a due: Merlino è un simbolo Wild in grado di sostituire tutti gli altri simboli normali in gioco come un comune jolly, mentre la gemma artigliata è un simbolo Scatter. Trovandone almeno tre in un’unica giocata, avremo la possibilità di accedere alla modalità bonus (giri gratuiti con Wild casuali) e quindi puntare a una vincita più corposa.
Sicuramente l’aspetto originale della slot incuriosirà molti giocatori, sebbene sarà necessaria un po’ di pratica per poterla padroneggiare.
Slot simili a Merlin’s Money Burst
La magia è una cara amica delle slot online e possono essere trovati diversi titoli che utilizzano questa tematica al loro interno, come: The Magic Flute della Novomatic, Magic Mirror Delux 2 della Merkur Gaming o ancora Magic of the Ring Deluxe della Wazdan, anche se le scelte sono molto più numerose.

raw_translation.response:
Merlin’s Moneyburst
Magic has always fascinated everyone (not for nothing one of the greatest literary phenomena of recent years is Harry Potter) and what figure represents better the arcane attraction for the magical arts if not Merlin? Over the years, various slots have been dedicated to him, including Nextgen's Merlin’s Money Burst which we will talk about today.
Will the graphic and technical department of this slot be able to enchant us? Let's find out together.
Merlin’s Money Burst - Purple dominates
Let's start talking about the graphic aspect, because the eye also wants its part. The slot opens with a 3D model of Merlin that disappears showing us the game grid composed of the classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q...) all accompanied by eyes that look towards the mouse pointer.
A vaguely disturbing choice but one that shows attention to detail not to be underestimated. Other symbols that we see are the eye in the bottle, the magic grimoire and the clawed ruby.
From a sound point of view, instead, we have a faint music, almost a choir to keep us company, interrupted from time to time by the sound of a drop of water or by the cry of an owl: all to underline even more the illusion of being in the middle of a forest, ready to witness one of the spells of the great Wizard Merlin.
Merlin’s Money Burst – Game mechanics
We finally come to talk about the technical behavior and game mechanisms of this slot: the grid that appears in front of us is certainly unusual: in fact on one side we find a 3*3 pattern that shows 9 symbols at every spin, with a small accessory grid on the left showing another 4 symbols at every spin.
The paylines are 60, which together with an RTP of 96.75% balance a rather high volatility of the slot: we can therefore expect a good number of spins without winnings before getting one of interesting value but less compared to other titles with high volatility.
Among the various symbols that are found in the grid, particular attention must be paid to two: Merlin is a Wild symbol capable of replacing all other normal symbols in the game as a common joker, while the clawed gem is a Scatter symbol. Finding at least three in a single spin, we will have the chance to access the bonus mode (free spins with random Wilds) and therefore aim for a more substantial win.
Certainly, the original aspect of the slot will intrigue many players, although a little practice will be necessary to master it.
Slots similar to Merlin’s Money Burst
Magic is a dear friend of online slots and several titles can be found that use this theme, such as: The Magic Flute of Novomatic, Magic Mirror Delux 2 of Merkur Gaming or even Magic of the Ring Deluxe of Wazdan, although the choices are much more numerous.

Merlin’s Moneyburst
Magic has always fascinated everyone (not for nothing one of the greatest literary phenomena of recent years is Harry Potter) and what figure represents better the arcane attraction for the magical arts if not Merlin? Over the years, various slots have been dedicated to him, including Nextgen's Merlin’s Money Burst which we will talk about today.
Will the graphic and technical department of this slot be able to enchant us? Let's find out together.
Merlin’s Money Burst - Purple dominates
Let's start talking about the graphic aspect, because the eye also wants its part. The slot opens with a 3D model of Merlin that disappears showing us the game grid composed of the classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q...) all accompanied by eyes that look towards the mouse pointer.
A vaguely disturbing choice but one that shows attention to detail not to be underestimated. Other symbols that we see are the eye in the bottle, the magic grimoire and the clawed ruby.
From a sound point of view, instead, we have a faint music, almost a choir to keep us company, interrupted from time to time by the sound of a drop of water or by the cry of an owl: all to underline even more the illusion of being in the middle of a forest, ready to witness one of the spells of the great Wizard Merlin.
Merlin’s Money Burst – Game mechanics
We finally come to talk about the technical behavior and game mechanisms of this slot: the grid that appears in front of us is certainly unusual: in fact on one side we find a 3*3 pattern that shows 9 symbols at every spin, with a small accessory grid on the left showing another 4 symbols at every spin.
The paylines are 60, which together with an RTP of 96.75% balance a rather high volatility of the slot: we can therefore expect a good number of spins without winnings before getting one of interesting value but less compared to other titles with high volatility.
Among the various symbols that are found in the grid, particular attention must be paid to two: Merlin is a Wild symbol capable of replacing all other normal symbols in the game as a common joker, while the clawed gem is a Scatter symbol. Finding at least three in a single spin, we will have the chance to access the bonus mode (free spins with random Wilds) and therefore aim for a more substantial win.
Certainly, the original aspect of the slot will intrigue many players, although a little practice will be necessary to master it.

raw_translation.response:
Merlin's Moneyburst:

Magic has always attracted everyone (not for nothing one of the greatest literary phenomena of recent years is Harry Potter) and what figure represents better the arcane attraction for magic arts than Merlin? Over the years, various slots have been dedicated to him, including Nextgen's Merlin's Moneyburst, which we will talk about today.

Will the graphics and technical section of this slot manage to bewitch us? Let's find out together.

Merlin's Moneyburst - Purple reigns supreme
Let's start talking about the graphics aspect, because the eye also wants its part. The slot opens with a 3D model of Merlin disappearing, showing us the game grid made up of the classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q ...) all accompanied by eyes that look at the mouse pointer. 

A vaguely disturbing choice but one that shows attention to detail not to be underestimated. Other symbols we see are the eye in the flask, the magic grimoire, and the clawed ruby.

From a sound point of view, on the other hand, we have faint music, almost a chorus to keep us company, interrupted from time to time by the sound of a drop of water or the cry of an owl: all to further emphasize the illusion of being in the middle of a forest, ready to witness one of the spells of the great wizard Merlin.

Merlin's Moneyburst - Gameplay mechanics
We finally come to talking about the technical behavior and gameplay mechanisms of this slot: the grid that appears in front of us is certainly out of the ordinary. In fact, on the one hand, we find a 3 * 3 pattern that shows 9 symbols at each spin, with a small accessory grid to the left that shows another 4 symbols at each spin.

There are 60 paylines, which together with the RTP of 96.75%, balance out to a rather high volatility of the slot: we can therefore expect a good number of spins without winnings before obtaining one of interesting value, but less than other titles with high volatility.

Among the various symbols found in the grid, particular attention must be paid to two: Merlin is a Wild symbol capable of replacing all other normal symbols in the game like a common wild card, while the clawed gem is a Scatter symbol. Finding at least three in a single spin, we will have the opportunity to access the bonus mode (free spins with random Wilds) and therefore aim for a more substantial win.

Certainly, the original aspect of the slot will intrigue many players, although a bit of practice will be necessary to master it.

Slots similar to Merlin's Moneyburst
Magic is a dear friend of online slots and several titles can be found that use this theme within them, such as Novomatic's The Magic Flute, Merkur Gaming's Magic Mirror Delux 2, or even Wazdan's Magic of the Ring Deluxe, although there are many more choices available.

message.content:
Merlin's Moneyburst:

Magic has always attracted everyone (not for nothing one of the greatest literary phenomena of recent years is Harry Potter) and what figure represents better the arcane attraction for magic arts than Merlin? Over the years, various slots have been dedicated to him, including Nextgen's Merlin's Moneyburst, which we will talk about today.

Will the graphics and technical section of this slot manage to bewitch us? Let's find out together.

Merlin's Moneyburst - Purple reigns supreme
Let's start talking about the graphics aspect, because the eye also wants its part. The slot opens with a 3D model of Merlin disappearing, showing us the game grid made up of the classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q ...) all accompanied by eyes that look at the mouse pointer. 

A vaguely disturbing choice but one that shows attention to detail not to be underestimated. Other symbols we see are the eye in the flask, the magic grimoire, and the clawed ruby.

From a sound point of view, on the other hand, we have faint music, almost a chorus to keep us company, interrupted from time to time by the sound of a drop of water or the cry of an owl: all to further emphasize the illusion of being in the middle of a forest, ready to witness one of the spells of the great wizard Merlin.

Merlin's Moneyburst - Gameplay mechanics
We finally come to talking about the technical behavior and gameplay mechanisms of this slot: the grid that appears in front of us is certainly out of the ordinary. In fact, on the one hand, we find a 3 * 3 pattern that shows 9 symbols at each spin, with a small accessory grid to the left that shows another 4 symbols at each spin.

There are 60 paylines, which together with the RTP of 96.75%, balance out to a rather high volatility of the slot: we can therefore expect a good number of spins without winnings before obtaining one of interesting value, but less than other titles with high volatility.

Among the various symbols found in the grid, particular attention must be paid to two: Merlin is a Wild symbol capable of replacing all other normal symbols in the game like a common wild card, while the clawed gem is a Scatter symbol. Finding at least three in a single spin, we will have the opportunity to access the bonus mode (free spins with random Wilds) and therefore aim for a more substantial win.

Certainly, the original aspect of the slot will intrigue many players, although a bit of practice will be necessary to master it.

Slots similar to Merlin's Moneyburst
Magic is a dear friend of online slots and several titles can be found that use this theme within them, such as Novomatic's The Magic Flute, Merkur Gaming's Magic Mirror Delux 2, or even Wazdan's Magic of the Ring Deluxe, although there are many more choices available.

raw_translation_without_faq.response: Merlin's Moneyburst is an online slot game dedicated to the legendary wizard Merlin. The game has an unusual layout, with a 3*3 grid showing 9 symbols at each spin, and another 4 symbols grid to the left. There are 60 paylines, making the game quite volatile, with a 96.75% RTP. The game has several symbols, including Merlin as a Wild symbol and the clawed gem as a Scatter symbol that can trigger the bonus mode. The game's graphics and sound effects create a mystical atmosphere, suited to the theme of the game. Merlin's Moneyburst is a good choice for lovers of magic-themed online slots.

response.headline: Gameplay mechanics and layout
response.content: Merlin’s Moneyburst has an unconventional grid layout that consists of a 3 * 3 pattern with nine symbols and another small accessory grid to the left with four symbols for each spin. The slot has 60 paylines, and its RTP is 96.75%. It has a high volatility that makes it expectable to have a good number of spins without a winning combination, but the win amount will be less than the other high volatility slot titles.

response.headline: Paylines, RTP, and volatility
response.content: Merlin’s Moneyburst has 60 paylines, an RTP of 96.75%, and high volatility. The high volatility nature of the game means that it is expected to have a good number of unsuccessful spins, but the payout will still be less than other high volatility games.

response.headline: Symbols and their significance
response.content: The game has a variety of symbols, including Merlin, which is a wild symbol that can replace all others except the scatter. The other notable symbol is the clawed gem, which is the Scatter symbol. Players can access the Bonus mode and enjoy free spins with random wilds if they get at least three clawed gems on their reels. The other symbols include the classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q), an eye in a flask, a magic grimoire, and a clawed ruby.

response.headline: Graphics and sound effects
response.content: Merlin's Moneyburst has splendid graphics and sound effects that add to the magic theme of the game. When the game opens, a 3D model of Merlin appears and disappears to show the game grid. The classic playing card symbols are accompanied by eyes that look at the mouse pointer - an intriguing visual detail. The background music is faint, almost like a chorus, accompanied by the sound of a drop of water or the cry of an owl to depict a forest-like scenario.

response.headline: Target audience and overall impression
response.content: Merlin's Moneyburst is a bit of an unconventional slot, so it requires some familiarization to get used to the gameplay mechanisms and the unusual grid layout. The game will enthrall those who love magic and fantasy-themed games. Overall, the game is enjoyable and has decent winning potential, given its high volatility nature.

Among the various symbols found in the grid, particular attention must be paid to two: Merlin is a Wild symbol capable of replacing all other normal symbols in the game like a common wild card, while the clawed gem is a Scatter symbol. Review: Merlin's Moneyburst:

Magic has always attracted everyone (not for nothing one of the greatest literary phenomena of recent years is Harry Potter) and what figure represents better the arcane attraction for magic arts than Merlin? Over the years, various slots have been dedicated to him, including Nextgen's Merlin's Moneyburst, which we will talk about today.

Will the graphics and technical section of this slot manage to bewitch us? Let's find out together.

Merlin's Moneyburst - Purple reigns supreme
Let's start talking about the graphics aspect, because the eye also wants its part. The slot opens with a 3D model of Merlin disappearing, showing us the game grid made up of the classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q ...) all accompanied by eyes that look at the mouse pointer. 

A vaguely disturbing choice but one that shows attention to detail not to be underestimated. Other symbols we see are the eye in the flask, the magic grimoire, and the clawed ruby.

From a sound point of view, on the other hand, we have faint music, almost a chorus to keep us company, interrupted from time to time by the sound of a drop of water or the cry of an owl: all to further emphasize the illusion of being in the middle of a forest, ready to witness one of the spells of the great wizard Merlin.

Merlin's Moneyburst - Gameplay mechanics
We finally come to talking about the technical behavior and gameplay mechanisms of this slot: the grid that appears in front of us is certainly out of the ordinary. In fact, on the one hand, we find a 3 * 3 pattern that shows 9 symbols at each spin, with a small accessory grid to the left that shows another 4 symbols at each spin.

There are 60 paylines, which together with the RTP of 96.75%, balance out to a rather high volatility of the slot: we can therefore expect a good number of spins without winnings before obtaining one of interesting value, but less than other titles with high volatility.

Among the various symbols found in the grid, particular attention must be paid to two: Merlin is a Wild symbol capable of replacing all other normal symbols in the game like a common wild card, while the clawed gem is a Scatter symbol. Finding at least three in a single spin, we will have the opportunity to access the bonus mode (free spins with random Wilds) and therefore aim for a more substantial win.

Certainly, the original aspect of the slot will intrigue many players, although a bit of practice will be necessary to master it.

Slots similar to Merlin's Moneyburst
Magic is a dear friend of online slots and several titles can be found that use this theme within them, such as Novomatic's The Magic Flute, Merkur Gaming's Magic Mirror Delux 2, or even Wazdan's Magic of the Ring Deluxe, although there are many more choices available.

response.headline: Unleashing the Magic of Merlin's Symbols
response.content:
Gather round, folks! Merlin’s Moneyburst has got quite the repertoire of symbols for you to play with. For starters, there’s the man himself - Merlin! This old wizard is more than just a pretty face, as he can substitute any other symbol in the game (though he can't solve all your life problems - it's still best to talk to a therapist or something).

Then there's the clawed gem, a symbol that's so shiny you can't resist it even if you've got thumbs for fingers. Why? Because it unlocks the Bonus mode and dishes out the free spins with random wilds... That's what we call a win-win situation, folks.

The magic doesn't end there! You've got the classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q), an eye suspended in a flask (yes, you read that right), a magic grimoire (for all your spooky, supernatural needs), and a clawed ruby that may or may not have been stolen from a dragon's hoard of treasure. (Psst, Merlin made us promise not to reveal the ruby's whereabouts.)

Gameplay mechanics and layout

Merlin’s Moneyburst has an unconventional grid layout that consists of a 3 * 3 pattern with nine symbols and another small accessory grid to the left with four symbols for each spin. The slot has 60 paylines, and its RTP is 96.75%. It has a high volatility that makes it expectable to have a good number of spins without a winning combination, but the win amount will be less than the other high volatility slot titles.

Paylines, RTP, and volatility

Merlin’s Moneyburst has 60 paylines, an RTP of 96.75%, and high volatility. The high volatility nature of the game means that it is expected to have a good number of unsuccessful spins, but the payout will still be less than other high volatility games.

Symbols and their significance

The game has a variety of symbols, including Merlin, which is a wild symbol that can replace all others except the scatter. The other notable symbol is the clawed gem, which is the Scatter symbol. From a sound point of view, on the other hand, we have faint music, almost a chorus to keep us company, interrupted from time to time by the sound of a drop of water or the cry of an owl: all to further emphasize the illusion of being in the middle of a forest, ready to witness one of the spells of the great wizard Merlin.

Merlin's Moneyburst - Gameplay mechanics
We finally come to talking about the technical behavior and gameplay mechanisms of this slot: the grid that appears in front of us is certainly out of the ordinary. In fact, on the one hand, we find a 3 * 3 pattern that shows 9 symbols at each spin, with a small accessory grid to the left that shows another 4 symbols at each spin.

There are 60 paylines, which together with the RTP of 96.75%, balance out to a rather high volatility of the slot: we can therefore expect a good number of spins without winnings before obtaining one of interesting value, but less than other titles with high volatility.

Among the various symbols found in the grid, particular attention must be paid to two: Merlin is a Wild symbol capable of replacing all other normal symbols in the game like a common wild card, while the clawed gem is a Scatter symbol. Finding at least three in a single spin, we will have the opportunity to access the bonus mode (free spins with random Wilds) and therefore aim for a more substantial win.

Certainly, the original aspect of the slot will intrigue many players, although a bit of practice will be necessary to master it.

Slots similar to Merlin's Moneyburst
Magic is a dear friend of online slots and several titles can be found that use this theme within them, such as Novomatic's The Magic Flute, Merkur Gaming's Magic Mirror Delux 2, or even Wazdan's Magic of the Ring Deluxe, although there are many more choices available.

Review: Merlin's Moneyburst:

Magic has always attracted everyone (not for nothing one of the greatest literary phenomena of recent years is Harry Potter) and what figure represents better the arcane attraction for magic arts than Merlin? Will the graphics and technical section of this slot manage to bewitch us? Let's find out together.
